pages.title: Eukaryotic Mat
pages.text: $(l)Temporal Range:$() Paleoproterozoic (Statherian) - Cambrian$(br2)$(l)Habitat:$() Marine$(br)$(l)Method of Obtaining:$() Shears

Eukaryotic Mats represent clumped microbial eukaryote colonies that would otherwise not be represented as separate entities due to their minuscule size. The biota/lifeforms that are represented by this are the Volyn Biota, Protosterol biota, Longfengshania & Houjiashania.
